description.narrative: Emergency response, cross sectoral, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Private Sector Engagement. condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The status and conditions of children, adolescents and their families on the move is monitored and assessed, they are given an active role in the planification and feedback of the intervention, and the special conditions of women and adolescents girls are taken into consideration. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
